Content: Recycling of equipment or material should only happen after it was
made sure there is no use for it elsewhere. So there should be a
''trade-tree-like'' distribution structure like for the trade networks.
Not doing this may lead to equipment being recycled in one place,
while another one starves. (Transport costs should of course be
considered, so that the game does not ship front-loading-rifles across
the galaxy, because there is a temporary shortage of modern guns.
